类 Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Ruoyu Zhi CS110 Professor:Jackie Horton This is a Card class that can be used to set up a card instance that holds suits and ranks variables.It also contains the basic method like accessors,toString and equals.
    作者:
    Ramon

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int ACE 
      static int CLUBS 
      static int DIAMONDS 
      static int HEARTS 
      static int JACK 
      static int KING 
      static int QUEEN 
      static int SPADES 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Card()
      no-args constructor that initialize a card to Ace of spades
      Card(int suit, int rank)
      constructor that takes both rank and suit as input to set up a card object

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int compareTo(Card otherCard)
      method to compare two cards
      boolean equals(Card otherCard)
      method that compares if two cards equal
      java.lang.String getPicName()
      get the filename of a card's corresponding picture
      int getRank()
      rank accessor
      int getSuit()
      suit accessor
      java.lang.String toString()
      return that current status of card to a string

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
